import { Tooltip } from './tooltip';

## React Tooltip component

Tooltips have very little to customize but can be used to comment on components.

### Component usage
```js
<Tooltip text="hello from Tooltip" />
```

### Using props to customize the text

Modify the text to see it change live:
```js live
<Tooltip text="hello from Tooltip" />
```
